contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Yes | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Morphine (band)|Morphine]] | Cover = Morphine-Yes (album cover).jpg | Released = March 1995 | Recorded = ? | Genre = [[Alternative rock]] | Length = 36:52 | Label = [[Rykodisc]] | Producers = Mark Sandman & Paul Q. Kolderie | Last album = '''''[[Cure for Pain]]''''' <br /> (1993) | This album = ''Yes'' <br /> (1995) | Next album = '''''[[Like Swimming]]''''' <br /> (1997) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|4.5|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r209389|first=Greg|last=Prato|accessdate=September 26, 2011}}</ref> | rev2 = [[Piero Scaruffi]] | rev2Score = (8/10) <ref>{{cite web |publisher=[[Piero Scaruffi]] |title=The History of Rock Music: Morphine|work=Piero Scaruffi's Music Database|year=1999|url=http://www.scaruffi.com/vol5/morphine.html|accessdate=September 26, 2011}}</ref> | rev3 = [[Rolling Stone]] | rev3Score = {{Rating|4|5}} <ref>{{cite journal |journal=[[Rolling Stone]] |title=Morphine: Yes : Music review |url=http://www.rollingstone.com/artists/morphine/albums/album/231006/review/5941532/yes |archiveurl=http://web.archive.org/web/20091016020353/http://www.rollingstone.com/artists/morphine/albums/album/231006/review/5941532/yes |archivedate=October 16, 2009 |date=March 23, 1995 |issue=RS 704 |first=Jon|last=Garelick|accessdate=September 26, 2011}}</ref> |noprose=yes }} '''''Yes''''' is an [[album]] by [[alternative rock]] band [[Morphine (band)|Morphine]], released in March 1995. ==Track listing== All songs written by [[Mark Sandman]] (except as noted). # "Honey White" – 3:06 # "Scratch" – 3:13 # "Radar" – 3:28 # "Whisper" – 3:28 # "Yes" – 2:00 # "All Your Way" – 3:04 # "Super Sex" – 3:53 # "I Had My Chance" – 3:05 # "The Jury" (Sandman, Swart) – 2:07 # "Sharks" – 2:22 # "Free Love" – 4:14 # "Gone for Good" – 2:52 ==References== {{Reflist}} [[Category:1995 albums]] [[Category:Morphine (band) albums]] [[Category:Rykodisc albums]] {{1990s-rock-album-stub}}
